summary.name: Summary
summary.content: Strategic Lead Product Designer with 10+ years of experience driving end-to-end design excellence for complex B2B enterprise products. Proven track record of shaping design culture and mentoring global teams (20+ designers) to deliver intuitive, cohesive user experiences that drive measurable business impact. Expert in architecting scalable design systems, integrating AI-driven workflows, and partnering with Engineering and Product leadership to translate complex technical requirements into elegant, user-centered solutions.

items.summary:
Design Leadership & Culture: Lead and mentor a global team of 20+ designers across the US, China, and India, establishing a culture of creative excellence through respectful critiques and standardized design processes.

Design Systems Strategy: Architected and managed a comprehensive Figma-based design system (500+ components), introducing governance models and versioning that reduced design time by 25% and saved ~$1M in licensing costs.

End-to-End Product Execution: Directed the end-to-end design strategy for the Enterprise Worker & Asset Safety platform, unifying disparate legacy tools into a cohesive, intelligent SaaS solution serving 80K+ global users.

Strategic Collaboration: Partner closely with Engineering and Product Management to define roadmaps and execute vision, facilitating 50+ workshops to align stakeholders on product direction and technical feasibility.

Business Impact: Drove a 30% increase in product adoption and customer satisfaction by integrating user feedback loops and conducting 100+ validation sessions to refine complex workflows.

Innovation: Pioneered the integration of AI-driven features, including predictive safety insights and "Copilot-style" dashboards, enhancing user decision-making in high-stakes environments.

Driven design excellence in a fully remote Agile environment, creating high-fidelity prototypes for enterprise audit applications that accelerated stakeholder alignment on MVP scope.

Influenced the adoption of modern design practices and improved cross-functional cohesion between Design, Product, and Engineering teams.

Established the company's first scalable design system and introduced design thinking frameworks, directly contributing to a 20% increase in conversion rates and the platform's successful acquisition.

Led the end-to-end design of a multi-channel analytics dashboard, translating complex inventory data into clear, actionable insights for merchants managing 10,000+ SKUs.
Designed intuitive, data-dense workflows for internal audit and compliance tools, ensuring strict accessibility compliance and responsiveness.

items.name: Enterprise Worker & Asset Safety (EWAS) Platform
items.description:
Challenge: Transform a fragmented ecosystem of legacy safety tools into a unified, modern B2B platform.
Solution: Led the strategy and execution of a cloud-native platform featuring AI-guided onboarding and real-time fleet management.
Impact: Delivered a cohesive experience for 80K+ users, reducing device configuration time by 20% and eliminating manual entry errors through novel NFC/QR interactions.

items.name: Enterprise Design Systems & DesignOps
items.description:
Challenge: Inefficient workflows and inconsistent UI across a distributed global team using legacy tools.
Solution: Built and governed a scalable Figma design system with tokenized variables and automated workflows. Implemented "branching/merging" protocols for seamless developer handoff.
Impact: Reduced file duplication by 50%, accelerated delivery cycles, and established a shared design language across web and mobile touchpoints.

items.name: Vertex One Industrial Platform
items.description:
Challenge: Design a fail-safe HMI (Human Machine Interface) for mission-critical toxic gas monitoring in semiconductor fabrication.
Solution: Translated complex sensor data into clear, actionable visualizations. Designed "guided maintenance" workflows to reduce operator error in high-stress scenarios.
Impact: Created a best-in-class user experience that differentiated the product in the market and improved operator safety and efficiency.
